data.name: Hit Him
data.detailed_description:
Our game is a human pear simulator.

If you had a bad day and you feel angry and irritated and really want to beat someone.
Then you can use our interactive pear that will withstand all the hatred and anger that you can take out on it.
It will not give you change, will not turn to the police, but will silently endure, and the game also provides various tools to satisfy your desires, such as:
  • Boxing glove
  • Leg
  • bat
  • Brass knuckles
The game has a counter. Who can calculate how much damage you have done, you can brag about it among your friends or acquaintances, and everything else our game is just funny
